import {useState,useEffect} from "react" import axios from 'axios'; const InitialScreen = () => { const [films,setFilms] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const promise = axios.get("//mock-api.driven.com.br/api/v5/cineflex/movies") promise.then((response) => { console.log(response.data) }) },[]) // Component return (

Selecione o filme

); } export default InitialScreen
